sentences.sentence: Her face became a chalky white.
The chalky soil around Saumur produces the famous Anjou wines.
sentences.translation: 围绕索米尔的含白垩土壤出产著名的安茹葡萄酒。

sentences.sentence: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.translation: 将有机物质掺入白垩质土壤中将会降低碱性。
